PathComplete

绝对路径

public string? PathComplete { get; }

Property Value

string

PathDescribe

找到的路径(参照面板的名称)

PathSave路径不存在时,返回是外部参照dwg文件路径

public string? PathDescribe { get; }

Property Value

string

PathRelative

相对路径

public string? PathRelative { get; }

Property Value

string

PathSave

外部参照保存的路径

它们会是以下任一路径:
0x01 相对路径
0x02 绝对路径
0x03 共目录优先找到的路径(文件夹整体移动会发生此类情况) 

public string? PathSave { get; }

Property Value

string

public static string? PathConverter(string? directory, string? fileRelations, PathConverterModes converterModes)

Parameters

directory string

fileRelations string

converterModes PathConverterModes
